languages.text: В последний свой миг она попыталась ворваться в мир то{mf|го|й}, кого звала элантахом, постичь, как могло столь чудовищное предательство вызреть в сердце то{mf|го|й}, кто был ей столь дорог. То, что она узрела, было столь ужасно, что сердце отважной Ирлиэт остановилось в то же мгновение.

In her final moments, she tried to break into the world of the one she called her elantach, to understand how a betrayal so vile could ripen in the heart of one so dear to her. The things she saw there were so heinous that the heart of valiant Yrliet stopped beating that very instant.
languages.original_text: В последний свой миг она попыталась ворваться в мир то{mf|го|й}, кого звала элантахом, постичь, как могло столь чудовищное предательство вызреть в сердце то{mf|го|й}, кто был ей столь дорог. То, что она узрела, было столь ужасно, что сердце отважной Ирлиэт остановилось в то же мгновение.

traits.locale_text: In her last moments she tried to break into the world of the one she called elantach, to understand, how could a betrayal so vile ripen in the heart of someone so dear to her. The things she saw were so heinous, that the heart of valiant Yrliet stopped beating the same second.

In her last moments she tried to break into the world of the one she called elantach, to understand, how could a betrayal so vile ripen in the heart of someone so dear to her. The things she saw were so heinous, that the heart of valiant Yrliet stopped beating the same second.

In her final moments, she tried to break into the world of the one she called her elantach, to understand how a betrayal so vile could ripen in the heart of someone so dear to her. The things she saw were so heinous that the heart of valiant Yrliet stopped beating that very instant.

In her final moments, she tried to break into the world of the one she called her elantach, to understand how a betrayal so vile could ripen in the heart of someone so dear to her. The things she saw were so heinous that the heart of valiant Yrliet stopped beating that very instant.

In her final moments, she tried to break into the world of the one she called her elantach, to understand how a betrayal so vile could ripen in the heart of one so dear to her. The things she saw there were so heinous that the heart of valiant Yrliet stopped beating that very instant.

In her final moments, she tried to break into the world of the one she called her elantach, to understand how a betrayal so vile could ripen in the heart of one so dear to her. The things she saw there were so heinous that the heart of valiant Yrliet stopped beating that very instant.

languages.text: 在生命的最后时刻，她试图深入那个被她称为“外界人”的生物的内心世界，想理解这样卑鄙的背叛究竟是如何她心爱之人的灵魂中生根发芽。勇敢的伊莉耶特看到了无比卑劣、可憎的情形，她的心跳也随之而息。
languages.original_text: In her final moments, she tried to break into the world of the one she called her elantach, to understand how a betrayal so vile could ripen in the heart of one so dear to her. The things she saw there were so heinous that the heart of valiant Yrliet stopped beating that very instant.

traits.locale_text: 在生命的最后时刻，她试图深入那个被她称为“外界人”的生物的内心世界，想理解这样卑鄙的背叛究竟是如何她心爱之人的灵魂中生根发芽。勇敢的伊莉耶特看到了无比卑劣、可憎的情形，她的心跳也随之而息。

languages.text: In ihren letzten Augenblicken versuchte sie, in die Welt {mf|des Mannes einzudringen, den|der Frau einzudringen, die} sie Elantach genannt hatte. Sie wollte zu verstehen, wie ein solch schändlicher Verrat in dem Herzen einer Person reifen konnte, die ihr so wichtig gewesen war. Was sie dort sah, war derart grauenhaft, dass das Herz der tapferen Yrliet augenblicklich zu schlagen aufhörte.
languages.original_text: In her final moments, she tried to break into the world of the one she called her elantach, to understand how a betrayal so vile could ripen in the heart of one so dear to her. The things she saw there were so heinous that the heart of valiant Yrliet stopped beating that very instant.

traits.locale_text: In ihren letzten Augenblicken versuchte sie, in die Welt {mf|des Mannes einzudringen, den|der Frau einzudringen, die} sie Elantach genannt hatte. Sie wollte zu verstehen, wie ein solch schändlicher Verrat in dem Herzen einer Person reifen konnte, die ihr so wichtig gewesen war. Was sie dort sah, war derart grauenhaft, dass das Herz der tapferen Yrliet augenblicklich zu schlagen aufhörte.

languages.text: Dans ses derniers instants, elle essaya de pénétrer dans le monde de {mf|celui|celle} qu'elle appelait elantach, afin de comprendre comment une personne si chère à son cœur avait pu la trahir ainsi. Les horreurs qu'Yrliet y découvrit la glacèrent d'horreur, si bien que son cœur pourtant vaillant cessa de battre sur le coup.
languages.original_text: In her final moments, she tried to break into the world of the one she called her elantach, to understand how a betrayal so vile could ripen in the heart of one so dear to her. The things she saw there were so heinous that the heart of valiant Yrliet stopped beating that very instant.

traits.locale_text: Dans ses derniers instants, elle essaya de pénétrer dans le monde de {mf|celui|celle} qu'elle appelait elantach, afin de comprendre comment une personne si chère à son cœur avait pu la trahir ainsi. Les horreurs qu'Yrliet y découvrit la glacèrent d'horreur, si bien que son cœur pourtant vaillant cessa de battre sur le coup.

languages.text: En sus últimos momentos, trató de acceder al mundo de la persona a la que llamaba elantach para comprender cómo podía haber nacido una traición tan vil en el interior de alguien tan importante para ella. Lo que vio en su mente era tan espantoso que el corazón de la valiente Yrliet se detuvo en ese instante.
languages.original_text: In her final moments, she tried to break into the world of the one she called her elantach, to understand how a betrayal so vile could ripen in the heart of one so dear to her. The things she saw there were so heinous that the heart of valiant Yrliet stopped beating that very instant.

traits.locale_text: En sus últimos momentos, trató de acceder al mundo de la persona a la que llamaba elantach para comprender cómo podía haber nacido una traición tan vil en el interior de alguien tan importante para ella. Lo que vio en su mente era tan espantoso que el corazón de la valiente Yrliet se detuvo en ese instante.

languages.text: 彼女は死を目前にして、かくも下劣な裏切りが大切な相手の心でどんな風に膿んでゆくのかを知るために、 エランタと呼ぶ者の世界に分け入ろうとした。そうして見えた光景はあまりに残酷で、勇敢なユリエットの心がたちまちに鼓動を止めたという。
languages.original_text: In her final moments, she tried to break into the world of the one she called her elantach, to understand how a betrayal so vile could ripen in the heart of one so dear to her. The things she saw there were so heinous that the heart of valiant Yrliet stopped beating that very instant.

traits.locale_text: 彼女は死を目前にして、かくも下劣な裏切りが大切な相手の心でどんな風に膿んでゆくのかを知るために、 エランタと呼ぶ者の世界に分け入ろうとした。そうして見えた光景はあまりに残酷で、勇敢なユリエットの心がたちまちに鼓動を止めたという。

languages.text: Son anlarında, elantach dediği kişinin dünyasına girmeye, onun için bu kadar değerli olan bir kalbin nasıl olur da böyle habis bir ihanette bulunabildiğini anlamaya çalıştı. Orada gördüğü şeyler öylesine çirkindi ki erdemli Yrliet'in kalbi, anında atmayı kesti.
languages.original_text: In her final moments, she tried to break into the world of the one she called her elantach, to understand how a betrayal so vile could ripen in the heart of one so dear to her. The things she saw there were so heinous that the heart of valiant Yrliet stopped beating that very instant.

traits.locale_text: Son anlarında, elantach dediği kişinin dünyasına girmeye, onun için bu kadar değerli olan bir kalbin nasıl olur da böyle habis bir ihanete ev sahipliği yapabildiğini anlamaya çalıştı. Orada gördüğü şeyler öylesine çirkindi ki, erdemli Yrliet'in kalbi direkt o anda atmayı durdurdu.
